data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: My mom buys us new pajamas every year for Christmas. This ____, ____ are ____ with ____ stars ____ them. They ____ so ____ that I wear ____ around ____ house ____ the ____. But they're actually too warm to sleep in.
data.partBlankContent: My mom buys us new pajamas every year for Christmas. This ye__, mi__ are wh___ with yel___ stars o_ them. They a__ so comfo______ that I wear th__ around t__ house a__ the ti__. But they're actually too warm to sleep in.
data.fullContent: My mom buys us new pajamas every year for Christmas. This year, mine are white with yellow stars on them. They are so comfortable that I wear them around the house all the time. But they're actually too warm to sleep in.
data.answer: 我妈妈每年圣诞节都给我们买新睡衣。今年，我的是白色的，上面有黄色的星星。它们很舒服，所以我总是在家里穿。但实际上它们太暖和了，不适合睡觉。
